About Me

A proven visionary and strategic leader that translates business strategies into maximum profits to commensurate with the best interest of customers, co-workers, vendors, and clients. An expert in enhancing profitability; reducing over-head; streamlining daily work process. Very knowledgeable of many computer applications and languages and proven track record of quickly learning any computer programs and languages or work processes with little or no human error. Dedicated to maintaining a reputation built on quality, service, and uncompromising ethics.

Work

Run Buddy

Built With: HTML,CSS

Run Buddy is a web site made in HTML and CSS that offers fitness training services. It has client input fields to get the client in touch with the right fitness representative.

View Project on GitHub

Yes or No Magic 8 Ball Application

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS

This application is a simple application that features a question input field and results in a yes or no answer in the magic 8 ball graphic.

View Project on GitHub

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, HTML, Moment.js, Bootstrap, Open Weather API

This Weather Dashboard features the 5 day forecast of any searched city. It also lists the current forecast of that city and saves the searched cities to your local storage.

View Project on GitHub
